ingredients.ingredient: ½ pound salmon, cut into chunks
½ cup thinly sliced kale, or to taste
1 (1/2 inch) piece fresh ginger, thinly sliced, or to taste
1 tablespoon water, or more if needed
salt and ground black pepper to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
1 cup cooked rice, or to taste
1 sheet seaweed, torn into small pieces
½ teaspoon toasted sesame oil, or to taste

cookingTips: Cook salmon skin-side down first to crisp the exterior while keeping flesh tender
Massage kale gently with sesame oil to soften it slightly before serving
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How can you layer flavors with ginger, sesame, and fresh greens for maximum umami?
